hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(':charge_date',INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') as expire_date from dual

select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(min(c_ch.charge_date),INTERVAL round(datediff(max(c_ch.expire_date),min(c_ch.charge_date))/30)+1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') as next_expire_date from car_charge c_ch where c_ch.car_id=:car_id
select * from car_charge where car_id=:car_id order by car_charge_id desc

select c_ch_main.car_id,expire_date,c.car_num,e.name as emp_name,c_b.name as car_brand_name,c_c.name as car_color_name from ( select car_id,max(c_ch.expire_date) expire_date from car_charge c_ch group by car_id ) c_ch_main left join car c on c.car_id=c_ch_main.car_id left join employee e on e.employee_id=c.employee_id left join car_brand c_b on c.car_brand_id=c_b.car_brand_id left join car_color c_c on c_c.car_color_id=c.car_color_id where c_ch_main.expire_date<CURRENT_DATE() and e.isdel=0 and c.isdel=0
